Package org.derekn.p2pSim

package org.derekn.p2pSim
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Client
    Represents a client node in the P2P network.
    consoleTest
    A simple console test class to run and observe the P2P simulation.
    Constants
    Defines constant values used throughout the simulation.
    Leecher
    Represents a peer in the network that downloads files but doesn't initially possess all chunks.
    NetworkNode
    Abstract base class representing a node in a network.
    PeerNode
    Abstract class representing a peer node in the network.
    Seeder
    Represents a peer node that starts with the full file and only uploads chunks.
    SimulationController
    Controls the overall simulation of the P2P file-sharing network.
    SimulationGUI
    The main JavaFX GUI application for configuring and launching the P2P file sharing simulation.
    SimulationView
    Visualization component for rendering the peer-to-peer simulation.
    Supernode
    Represents a Supernode in the P2P network, a high-capacity peer with enhanced upload and download capabilities.
    Transfer
    Represents a data transfer event between two peer nodes.
